import Button from "./Button.js"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import "./styling/ExcursionInfoCSS.css" const ExcursionInfo = ({ excursion, excursionDetails }) => { // console.log(excursion); return (

{excursion.Name}

Cost: ${excursion.Cost}

Duration: {excursion.Duration}

Months: {excursion.Months}

Max. Participants: {excursion.MaxParticipants}

{excursionDetails.description}

) } export default ExcursionInfo
